snp3.6:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
snp3.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sabhiyassa paribbajakassa puranasalohitaya devataya panha uddittha honti:
snp3.6:1.4: “yo te, sabhiya, samano va brahmano va ime panhe puttho byakaroti tassa santike brahmacariyam careyyasi”ti.
snp3.6:2.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbajako tassa devataya santike te panhe uggahetva ye te samanabrahmana sanghino ganino ganacariya nata yasassino titthakara sadhusammata bahujanassa, seyyathidam—
snp3.6:2.2: purano kassapo makkhaligosalo ajito kesakambalo pakudho kaccano sancayo belatthaputto nigantho nataputto—
snp3.6:2.4: Te sabhiyena paribbajakena panhe puttha na sampayanti;
snp3.6:3.2: “ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana sanghino ganino ganacariya nata yasassino titthakara sadhusammata bahujanassa, seyyathidam—
snp3.6:3.4: te maya panhe puttha na sampayanti,
snp3.6:4.2: “ayampi kho samano gotamo sanghi ceva gani ca ganacariyo ca nato yasassi titthakaro sadhusammato bahujanassa;
snp3.6:4.3: yannunaham samanam gotamam upasankamitva ime panhe puccheyyan”ti.
snp3.6:5.2: “yepi kho te bhonto samanabrahmana jinna vuddha mahallaka addhagata vayoanuppatta thera rattannu cirapabbajita sanghino ganino ganacariya nata yasassino titthakara sadhusammata bahujanassa, seyyathidam—
snp3.6:5.4: tepi maya panhe puttha na sampayanti,
snp3.6:5.5: asampayanta kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaronti, api ca mannevettha patipucchanti;
snp3.6:5.6: kim pana me samano gotamo ime panhe puttho byakarissati.
snp3.6:5.7: Samano hi gotamo daharo ceva jatiya, navo ca pabbajjaya”ti.
snp3.6:6.2: “samano kho daharoti na unnatabbo na paribhotabbo.
snp3.6:6.3: Daharopi cesa samano gotamo mahiddhiko hoti mahanubhavo, yannunaham samanam gotamam upasankamitva ime panhe puccheyyan”ti.
snp3.6:7.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbajako yena rajagaham tena carikam pakkami.
snp3.6:7.2: Anupubbena carikam caramano yena rajagaham veluvanam kalandakanivapo, yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
snp3.6:7.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
snp3.6:7.4: Ekamantam nisinno kho sabhiyo paribbajako bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi—
snp3.6:11.3: Yam vataham annesu samanabrahmanesu okasakammamattampi nalattham tam me idam samanena gotamena okasakammam katan”ti.
snp3.6:11.4: Attamano pamudito udaggo pitisomanassajato bhagavantam panham apucchi—
snp3.6:14.4: Ussada yassa na santi sorato so.
snp3.6:17.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbajako bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva attamano pamudito udaggo pitisomanassajato bhagavantam uttarim panham apucchi—
snp3.6:23.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbajako …pe… bhagavantam uttarim panham apucchi—
snp3.6:29.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbajako …pe… bhagavantam uttarim panham apucchi—
snp3.6:35.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbajako …pe… bhagavantam uttarim panham apucchi—
snp3.6:39.4: Patigha yassa na santi caranava so.
snp3.6:41.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbajako bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva attamano pamudito udaggo pitisomanassajato utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam sammukha saruppahi gathahi abhitthavi:
snp3.6:52.1: Atha kho sabhiyo paribbajako bhagavato padesu sirasa nipatitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp3.6:52.3: esaham bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca;
snp3.6:52.4: labheyyaham, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
snp3.6:53.1: “Yo kho, sabhiya, annatitthiyapubbo imasmim dhammavinaye akankhati pabbajjam, akankhati upasampadam, so cattaro mase parivasati; catunnam masanam accayena araddhacitta bhikkhu pabbajenti, upasampadenti bhikkhubhavaya.
snp3.6:54.1: “Sace, bhante, annatitthiyapubba imasmim dhammavinaye akankhanta pabbajjam, akankhanta upasampadam cattaro mase parivasanti, catunnam masanam accayena araddhacitta bhikkhu pabbajenti, upasampadenti bhikkhubhavaya, aham cattari vassani parivasissami; catunnam vassanam accayena araddhacitta bhikkhu pabbajentu upasampadentu bhikkhubhavaya”ti.
snp3.6:54.2: Alattha kho sabhiyo paribbajako bhagavato santike pabbajjam alattha upasampadam …pe…
snp3.6:54.3: annataro kho panayasma sabhiyo arahatam ahositi.
